original_title: Type LUPIN ～ルパン、最後の挑戦状～
overview: This is a Special DVD episode of Kamen Rider Drive, and the fifth special in the Secret Mission series. This special marks the return and final appearance of Zoruku Tojo as Kamen Rider Lupin after his defeat in Kamen Rider × Kamen Rider Drive & Gaim: Movie War Full Throttle.
title: Kamen Rider Drive: Type LUPIN ~Lupin, The Last Challenge~
